---
title: "Research"
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions_website.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1B2gc55CwWn0QidoLk3aqWXFaKGFXqekKV94LVyY7Gug/edit?usp=sharing",  
  pdf_mode = 'false'
)

```

### Publications 

```{r}
# Note the special double pipe so we modify the CV object in place
CV %<>% print_section("publications") 
```
 
### Selected Presentations

```{r}
# Note the special double pipe so we modify the CV object in place
CV %<>% print_section("presentations") 
```
